resources.string: QuizApp
Fruit or Veggie?
Through this quiz your knowledge about fruits and vegetables will be tested!\n Good Luck!
Tell us how we should call you
Click to Start
Please scroll down to see rest of the test.\n You will be notified about your progress after each answer and at the end of the quiz.
Is potato a fruit or vegetable?
Is tomato a fruit or vegetable?
Check the ones below and click the ones that are fruits!
Write down the one that is not a vegetable; pumpkin, turnip, bean?
Submit

\nYou are amazing! You really know what is fruit or vegetable! \nThank you for doing this short quiz and proving your skills"

Correct answers:
 Potato is a vegetable!
 Tomato is a fruit!
 Avocado and Bell pepper are fruits!
 Lastly, pumpkin is a fruit!
You didn't reach the full score, but it is good!!
\nBecause now, you are an expert on some of the fruit or vegetables that you didn\'t know before :).\nThank you for doing this short quiz!
